languages.text: "Неумирающий явил свое знамение на крови предателей. Охота, что была начата, будет завершена. И завершена она будет раскрытием великого обмана. Наш враг неуловим, потому что имеет могучего союзника. Того, кто возглашает веру в Императора на этом корабле. Корабельный исповедник — заодно с Немезитом. Он станет следующей добычей".

"The Undying One has manifested his omen in the traitors' blood. The hunt that has begun will be completed by the unveiling of a great deception. Our enemy is elusive because he has a powerful ally, one who espouses faith in the Emperor on this vessel. The ship's confessor is in league with Nemesite. He will be the next prey."
languages.original_text: "Неумирающий явил свое знамение на крови предателей. Охота, что была начата, будет завершена. И завершена она будет раскрытием великого обмана. Наш враг неуловим, потому что имеет могучего союзника. Того, кто возглашает веру в Императора на этом корабле. Корабельный исповедник — заодно с Немезитом. Он станет следующей добычей".

Our enemy is elusive because he has a powerful ally, one who espouses faith in the Emperor on this vessel. The ship's confessor is in league with Nemesite. He will be the next prey."

One who espouses faith in the Emperor on this vessel. The ship's confessor is in league with Nemesite. He shall be the next prey!"

languages.text: "Der Todlose hat sein Omen im Blut der Verräter manifestiert. Die begonnene Jagd wird durch die Enthüllung einer großen Täuschung beendet werden. Unser Feind ist schwer zu fassen, weil er einen mächtigen Verbündeten hat, der den Glauben an den Imperator auf diesem Schiff vertritt. Der Konfessor des Schiffs steckt mit Nemesit unter einer Decke. Er wird die nächste Beute sein."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has manifested his omen in the traitors' blood. The hunt that has begun will be completed by the unveiling of a great deception. Our enemy is elusive because he has a powerful ally, one who espouses faith in the Emperor on this vessel. The ship's confessor is in league with Nemesite. He will be the next prey."

traits.locale_text: "Der Todlose hat sein Omen manifestiert. Die begonnene Jagd wird durch die Enthüllung einer großen Täuschung beendet werden. Unser Feind ist schwer zu fassen, weil er einen mächtigen Verbündeten hat, der den Glauben an den Imperator auf diesem Schiff vertritt. Der Konfessor des Schiffs steckt mit Nemesit unter einer Decke. Er wird die nächste Beute sein."

languages.text: «El Inmortal ha manifestado su presagio en la sangre de los traidores. La cacería que ha comenzado se completará con la revelación de un gran engaño. Nuestro enemigo es esquivo porque cuenta con un aliado poderoso, uno que defiende la fe en el Emperador en esta nave. El confesor está confabulado con Nemesitio. Él será la próxima presa».
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has manifested his omen in the traitors' blood. The hunt that has begun will be completed by the unveiling of a great deception. Our enemy is elusive because he has a powerful ally, one who espouses faith in the Emperor on this vessel. The ship's confessor is in league with Nemesite. He will be the next prey."

traits.locale_text: «El Inmortal ha manifestado su presagio. La cacería que ha comenzado se completará con la revelación de un gran engaño. Nuestro enemigo es esquivo porque cuenta con un aliado poderoso, uno que defiende la fe en el Emperador en esta nave. El confesor está confabulado con Nemesitio. Él será la próxima presa».

languages.text: 「不死の者は、裏切り者の血に予言をハッキリと示された。始まった狩りは、大きな嘘が明らかになることで完結する。私たちの敵が神出鬼没なのは強力な味方がいるせいで、その味方はこの船で皇帝を信仰する者よ。この船の聴罪師はネメサイトと手を組んでいる。彼が次の獲物となるだろう」
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has manifested his omen in the traitors' blood. The hunt that has begun will be completed by the unveiling of a great deception. Our enemy is elusive because he has a powerful ally, one who espouses faith in the Emperor on this vessel. The ship's confessor is in league with Nemesite. He will be the next prey."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者は、予言をハッキリと示された。始まった狩りは、大きな嘘が明らかになることで完結する。私たちの敵が神出鬼没なのは強力な味方がいるせいで、その味方はこの船で皇帝を信仰する者よ。この船の聴罪師はネメサイトと手を組んでいる。彼が次の獲物となるだろう」

languages.text: “不死之神已经通过叛徒的鲜血，赐予了我祂的预兆。这场狩猎已经开始，它将会揭晓可怕的骗局。我们的敌人之所以难以捉摸，是因为他拥有一位强大的盟友，某位负责在这艘船上传播帝皇信仰的人。船上的告解神父和涅墨斯特是一伙的，下一个猎物就是他。”
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has manifested his omen in the traitors' blood. The hunt that has begun will be completed by the unveiling of a great deception. Our enemy is elusive because he has a powerful ally, one who espouses faith in the Emperor on this vessel. The ship's confessor is in league with Nemesite. He will be the next prey."

traits.locale_text: “不死之神已经赐予了我祂的预兆。这场狩猎已经开始，它将会揭晓可怕的骗局。我们的敌人之所以难以捉摸，是因为他拥有一位强大的盟友，某位负责在这艘船上传播帝皇信仰的人。船上的告解神父和涅墨斯特是一伙的，下一个猎物就是他。”

languages.text: « L'Immortel nous a accordé son présage dans le sang des traîtres. La chasse s'achèvera par la révélation d'une grande tromperie. Notre ennemi est insaisissable, car il a sur ce vaisseau un puissant allié ayant épousé la foi en l'Empereur. Le confesseur est complice de Némésite. Il sera la prochaine proie. »
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has manifested his omen in the traitors' blood. The hunt that has begun will be completed by the unveiling of a great deception. Our enemy is elusive because he has a powerful ally, one who espouses faith in the Emperor on this vessel. The ship's confessor is in league with Nemesite. He will be the next prey."

traits.locale_text: « L'Immortel nous a accordé son présage. La chasse s'achèvera par la révélation d'une grande tromperie. Notre ennemi est insaisissable, car il a sur ce vaisseau un puissant allié ayant épousé la foi en l'Empereur. Le confesseur est complice de Némésite. Il sera la prochaine proie. »

languages.text: "Ölmeyen, alametini hainlerin kanında ortaya koydu. Başlayan av, muazzam bir düzenbazlığın açığa çıkmasıyla tamamlanacak. Düşmanımız, gemideki İmparator inancını destekleyen güçlü bir müttefik edinmiş. Bundandır ki ele geçmesi pek zor. Geminin günah çıkarıcısı, Nemezit'le iş birliği yapıyor. Sıradaki av o olacak."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has manifested his omen in the traitors' blood. The hunt that has begun will be completed by the unveiling of a great deception. Our enemy is elusive because he has a powerful ally, one who espouses faith in the Emperor on this vessel. The ship's confessor is in league with Nemesite. He will be the next prey."
